com.jswiff.swfrecords
Class GradRecord

java.lang.Object
  com.jswiff.swfrecords.GradRecord
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public final class GradRecord
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

This class implements a gradient control point. A control point is defined by a ratio (i.e. the position of the control point in the gradient) and a color value. Depending on whether the tag this record is used in supports transparency or not, the color is either an RGBA or an RGB value (e.g. DefineShape3 supports transparency).

See Also:
Gradient, DefineShape3, Serialized Form

Constructor Summary

           Creates a new GradRecord (i.e. a gradient control point) instance.
 
Method Summary
 Color getColor()
          Returns the color value of the gradient control point.
 short getRatio()
          Returns the ratio of the gradient control point (a value between 0 and 255).
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

Constructor Detail

GradRecord

public GradRecord(short ratio,
                  Color color)

Creates a new GradRecord (i.e. a gradient control point) instance. You have to specify the ratio and the color value of the control point.

The ratio is a value between 0 and 255. 0 maps to the left edge of the gradient square for a linear gradient, 255 to the right edge. For radial gradients, 0 maps to the center of the square and 255 to the largest circle fitting inside the square.

The color is either an RGB or an RGBA instance, depending on whether the tag this record is used in supports transparency or not (e.g. DefineShape3 does).

Parameters:
ratio - control point ratio (from [0; 255])
color - the color value of the gradient control point
See Also:
DefineShape3
Method Detail

public Color getColor()
Returns the color value of the gradient control point.

public short getRatio()

Returns:
